Name: M-1グランプリへの道　～俺たちの出囃子はもう鳴っている～
About the game: The M-1 Grand Prix is the premier stage for comedians testing their chops to determine who is the best comedy duo. It is a long and arduous journey to reach the big stage, knocking down rivals left and right... The 'M-1 Grand Prix 2020' champion game directed by Noda Crystal of Magical Lovely is now available on Steam! Choose one team of four comedians! Magical Lovely Orthodox fighting style and power style with hammer. Sisonne Long-range attacks with chains and powerful attacks with swords. Panther Speed style, power style, and shouting 'Thank You!'. Kaerutei Dance attack with a machete and ultra wide range attack with a chainsaw. (and more...) Use unique attacks, flashy special moves, and an exchange system with your friends to make it to the finals! And on the final stage, the ultimate comedians await you! Main features of the game: ・M-1 Champion Noda Crystal's game! ・A traditional horizontal scrolling action game featuring famous Japanese comedians fighting each other ・Easy to use and exhilarating action! Use both your normal attacks and powerful special moves to get through the stages ・Use the 'Shift System' to cooperate with your partner. ・If you clear the game, a very special character awaits you as a playable character
